Package com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item has been clicked.
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemLongClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item has been clicked and held.
    LayoutTraverser.Processor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ItemClickSupport
    Helper to set onItem[Long]Click listeners on a RecyclerView.
    LayoutTraverser
    Helper to traverse a view hierarchy.
    LayoutViews
    Helper to iterate on views in a layout.
